Package com.tuany

Class Cutscenes

java.lang.Object
com.tuany.Cutscenes
public class Cutscenes extends Object
Hosts drawn-out cutscenes and random event messages which are called in the Game and Menu class.
Version:
1.1, 10/17/21
Author:
Tuany Van

  • Constructor Details

    • Cutscenes

      public Cutscenes​(String captainName)
      1-param constructor when the captainName is known.
      Parameters:
      captainName - The captain/player's name as chosen in Menu.java.

    • Cutscenes

      public Cutscenes()
      Default constructor when the captainName is not known yet.

  • Method Details

    • playCutscene

      public void playCutscene​(String cutScene)
      Mainly used to play drawn-out cutscenes with the DramaPrinter class.
      Parameters:
      cutScene - A string representing the name of a cutscene of to be played.

    • playCutscene

      public void playCutscene​(int cutScene)
      Used to play random event messages. Separated from the String-param function to prevent tripping any drawn-out cutscenes.
      Parameters:
      cutScene - A randomized integer which is made in the appropriate range of the random event messages.

    • setCaptainName

      public void setCaptainName​(String captainName)
      Setter for the captainName should the player specify a name.
      Parameters:
      captainName - A string representing the captain/player's name.
